title: Computer Engineering
text: I pursued my bachelor's degree in Turkey, where I spent four years honing my skills and knowledge. My educational journey in Turkey equipped me with a strong foundation and a global perspective, preparing me for diverse challenges and opportunities in the professional world.

title: High school
text: I successfully completed my high school education, gaining valuable skills and knowledge that have prepared me for the future. My high school years were instrumental in shaping my character and academic interests, setting the stage for my continued growth and achievements.
